subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
Protective Clothing and Gear
Helmets
Hats and Caps
Sporting Goods and Equipment
lead_paragraph: Mitchell, who took a line drive from the Twins’ Eduardo Nunez off the right side of his skull, can be added to the list of major league pitchers to have endured such mound trauma.
snippet: Mitchell, who took a line drive from the Twins’ Eduardo Nunez off the right side of his skull, can be added to the list of major league pitchers to have endured such mound trauma.
